paper_abstract: The paper addresses the problem of an aggregation of knowledge obtained from many sets of experiments each with different confidence level during identification of a linear dynamical system with uncertain parameters. The proposed approach describes the parameter space by a multidimensional fuzzy set specified by non-symmetric ellipsoidal a-cuts. An algorithm for determination of minimum confidence level guaranteeing stability of such a system is presented. (C) 2012 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Modelling ellipsoidal uncertainty by multidimensional fuzzy sets
